name: Fesk
description:
It's a roguelike cardgame where you travel across different landscapes, and try to gather enough food to make it.

How to play:

Play Walk to go to the next landscape, or play Camp to stay there overnight - each costs one food. 

Play tool cards to get items from the landscape. Tools have finite durability.

You can always discard cards, from the playing field or your hand. There is a discard pile in the bottom-right corner.

You lose when you run out of food. There is a leaderboard.

In case you want to play full-screen, you can play the game here, too:
https://asbjornolling.gitlab.io/scorejam23/
